Post A Tweet for Each Question

post_stack_tweets.Rd

Format and post StackOverflow questions as tweets, optionally returning them as a formatted list. This code is based on the tidyverse tweets bot by Jake Thompson.

post_stack_tweets(questions = NULL, hashtags = "rstats", post = TRUE)

Arguments

questions

A list of questions to tweet as produced by get_stack_questions.
hashtags

A character vector of hashtags to attach to the tweet. See add_twitter_api for details.
post

Logical, defaults to TRUE. Should the formatted tweets be published on twitter, if FALSE then the tweets are instead returned as a list.

Value

Either nothing is returned or a formated list of tweets.

Examples


ggplot2_qs <-  get_stack_questions(extracted_tags = "ggplot2",
                                  excluded_tags = "plotly",
                                  time_window = 60*24)

post_stack_tweets(ggplot2_qs, hashtags = "rstats", post = FALSE)
